name: The Crazy Cookies!
description:
The bad guys are on their way to find the good guy, will they succeed?
Play as a robot in a platforming RPG as you go on a quest to stop the protagonist!
This game is a 2D platforming RPG where you use weapons to fight enemies and level yourself up to fight what lies ahead.

This game includes:
- 40 Levels of fighting enemies and leveling up weapons
- 12 weapons to use as you purchase them with gems you've collected
- Hidden secrets to help increase your level
